adv.js: { const id_params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get("id"); let datas = await db.m_user.findMany({ where: { id: Number(id_params), }, }); local.name = datas[0].display_name; local.dateBirth = datas[0].date_of_birth; local.phone = datas[0].phone; local.email = datas[0].email; local.address = datas[0].address; local.render(); }} > {children}

value_dropdown.value:
[
  { label: "Orthopedic Oncology", value: "Orthopedic Oncology" },

  { label: "Orthopedic Spot Injury", value: "Orthopedic Spot Injury" },
]
value_dropdown.valueBuilt: [{label:"Orthopedic Oncology",value:"Orthopedic Oncology"},{label:"Pedriatic Oncology",value:"Pedriatic Oncology"},{label:"Orthopedic Spot Injury",value:"Orthopedic Spot Injury"}];

action_function.valueBuilt: async()=>{let a=bcrypt.genSaltSync(10),e=bcrypt.hashSync(local.name,a);if(confirm("Are you sure to update this data ?")){let l={display_name:local.name,username:local.name,password:e,id_role:1,is_deleted:!1,created_date:new Date,created_by:user.id,phone:local.phone,address:local.address,date_of_birth:local.dateBirth,email:local.email},t=await db.m_user.update({where:{id:Number(new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get("id"))},data:l});local.name=null,local.phone=null,local.address=null,local.dateBirth=null,local.email=null,local.render(),navigate("/institution/data/ppds")}};

async()=>{if(confirm("Are you sure to delete this data ?")){let e=await db.m_user.delete({where:{id:Number(new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get("id"))}});navigate("/institution/data/ppds")}};
